headline: How Hershey–JAKKS Collectibles And Niche Chocolate Launches At Hershey (HSY) Have Changed Its Investment Story
summary: In recent months, JAKKS Pacific Inc. and The Hershey Company announced a new Charming Bag Charms doll and collectibles partnership running through December 31, 2026, while Hershey also launched a limited run of 10,000 US$8.99 Dubai-inspired chocolate bars in select US cities and Hershey’s Chocolate World Times Square. These moves, alongside fresh analyst coverage highlighting cost management and salty-snack expansion and insider share purchases after earlier stock weakness, suggest Hershey...

headline: Hershey (HSY): Revisiting Valuation After a Recent 10% Share Price Climb
summary: Recent share performance and why it matters now Hershey (HSY) has quietly climbed about 10% over the past month, even as its three year return still sits in negative territory, a mix that makes today’s valuation especially interesting for long term investors. See our latest analysis for Hershey. That recent 1 month share price return near 10%, after a choppy year where the 1 year total shareholder return is still under 10%, suggests sentiment is stabilising rather than surging.
